personalProjects.title: Team Q Swim
personalProjects.companyDescription: Booking management system for a local swim school
personalProjects.description: Single handedly developed full-stack with React Native and the AWS suite (DynamoDB as database). The app allows administrators to CRUD bookings and user profiles, while automatically tracking student attendance for analytics

personalProjects.title: ShapeLink
personalProjects.description: As a passion project in collaboration with another developer, designed, developed and published a mobile game to the App and Play stores. Implemented an in-game store and advertisements, the game was positively reviewed and ran smoothly.
